Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/ Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark due to, event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark, due to event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line and Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line and Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to fire department activity.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line and Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to fire department activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: 

  • #3 King Drive
  • #4 Cottage Grove
  • #12 Roosevelt
  • #29 State
  • #62 Archer
  • Red Line

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
